channel.title: Jarring client problems
channel.description:
Ok so im using insidiaX and I jarred my client perfectly but when i try to run the jar file it says that
"Could not find the main class:client. The Program will Exit."

item.title: Jarring client problems

item.description:

because i used the dropbox public link and i made my own applet

But now when i publish my site and go on site it shows my server but it also shows error connecting for details on a white
screen top left corner how can i fix this

My Applet Page Java is not installed on your machine or your browser does not allowed Java Applet to run
